snippet: Unemployment will remain at “very high” levels, according to a gloomy set of forecasts issued by the European Commission.
abstract: European Commission says European Union will experience only a very weak economic recovery in 2013 and unemployment will remain at 'very high' levels.

byline.contributor: Stephen Castle contributed reporting from London.

lead_paragraph: Unemployment will remain at “very high” levels, according to a gloomy set of forecasts issued by the European Commission.

headline.main: Europe Foresees Weak Recovery Next Year
headline.print_headline: Europe Foresees Weak Recovery Next Year
